Package sawtooth.sdk.messaging

Interface Future

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FutureByteString, FutureError
    public interface Future
    An object that will have a value at some point.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.google.protobuf.ByteString getResult()
      Block until the result is ready.
      com.google.protobuf.ByteString getResult​(long timeout)
      Block until timeout, then throw TimeoutException if result is not available.
      boolean isDone()
      The future is available.
      void setResult​(com.google.protobuf.ByteString byteString)
      Set the result of the Future.

    • Method Detail

      • getResult

        com.google.protobuf.ByteString getResult()
                                  throws InterruptedException,
                                         ValidatorConnectionError
        Block until the result is ready.
        Returns:
        the result ByteString
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - An interrupt happened during the method call.
        ValidatorConnectionError - The validator disconnected.

      • getResult

        com.google.protobuf.ByteString getResult​(long timeout)
                                  throws InterruptedException,
                                         TimeoutException,
                                         ValidatorConnectionError
        Block until timeout, then throw TimeoutException if result is not available.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The amount of time to wait.
        Returns:
        result ByteString
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - An interrupt happened.
        TimeoutException - The time to wait happened.
        ValidatorConnectionError - The validator disconnected.

      • setResult

        void setResult​(com.google.protobuf.ByteString byteString)
        throws ValidatorConnectionError
        Set the result of the Future.
        Parameters:
        byteString - the result.
        Throws:
        ValidatorConnectionError - The validator disconnected.

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        throws ValidatorConnectionError
        The future is available.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the future is resolved, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ValidatorConnectionError - The validator disconnected.
